Articles.Content:
Just today I have attempted to set a lightly modded install of 1.12.2, and in my attempts to resize the Kerbol system, I have realized that I hit a roadblock.
For whatever reason, any time I make a change to my settings.cfg file of Sigma Dimensions, Kopernicus fails to load the changes. 
Thanks for any and all help!

All of the relevant information to this issue is included in the github repository. 

https://github.com/WildShpee/Log-Files-3-21-22
